quoteText: These Terms will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York, excluding provisions of that would result in choice of the law of another jurisdiction to govern these Terms.
title: The court of law governing the terms is in the State of New York unless you are in Europe. If you are in Europe, then English law will apply

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state that, "These Terms will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York, excluding provisions of that would result in choice of the law of another jurisdiction to govern these Terms." The Terms of Use (in Part B, applicable to users in Europe) state that "English law will apply to all disputes and the interpretation of these Terms of Use. The English courts will have non-exclusive jurisdiction over any dispute arising from or related to your use of the Service."
